item.title: CVE-2024-44003|2024-09-18T14:38:11.814Z -- spicethemes -- spice%20starter%20sites
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in spicethemes Spice Starter Sites allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Spice Starter Sites: from n/a through 1.2.5.
